title: Add Tab Group for Class Editing and Final Comments
description: Add a nested tab group within the Class Management interface that displays when a class is selected. The tab group contains two tabs: 'Edit Class' (with edit/delete functionality) and 'Final Comments' (showing the final comments view for the selected class). This improves navigation and organizes class-related functionality more clearly.

complexity.reasoning: Reuses existing Tabs/TabPanel components from SubjectListItem pattern. Reorganizes existing UI elements (edit form, final comments button) into tabbed interface. No new backend APIs required. Estimated 1-2 weeks with 5 user stories covering tab group display, tab switching, content integration, and styling consistency.

factors.scope: 5 stories covering tab group structure, edit class tab, final comments tab, styling, and state management
factors.impact: Improved UX for class management, clearer separation of edit vs view functionality
factors.risk: Low - established pattern from SubjectListItem, reusing existing components
